quotes.quote: “If you don’t like something, change it. If you can’t change it, change your attitude.”
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: “The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.“
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: “The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing“
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: “You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.”
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: “The aim of art is to represent not the outward appearance of things, but their inward significance.“
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: “It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.”
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: “Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.”
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: “Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.”
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: “The true work of art is but a shadow of the divine perfection.“
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.quote: “Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.”
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: “Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.”
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: “Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma – which is living with the results of other people's thinking.”
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: “Art, in itself, is an attempt to bring order out of chaos.”
quotes.author: Stephen Sondheim

quotes.quote: “The artist is nothing without the gift, but the gift is nothing without work.”
quotes.author: Emile Zola

quotes.quote: “An artist must be free to choose what he does, certainly, but he must also never be afraid to do what he might choose.”
quotes.author: Langston Hughes

quotes.quote: “Be thankful for what you have; you’ll end up having more. If you concentrate on what you don't have, you will never, ever have enough.”
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: “Keep your face always toward the sunshine―and shadows will fall behind you.”
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: “If you don’t like the road you’re walking, start paving another one.”
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: “It always seems impossible until it's done.”
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: “When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.”
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: “With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.”
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: “Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.”
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: “Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.”
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: “Art is not what you see, but what you make others see.”
quotes.author: Edgar Degas

quotes.quote: “Where there is love there is life.”
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: “Art enables us to find ourselves and lose ourselves at the same time.”
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: “Vision is the art of seeing what is invisible to others.”
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: “Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.”
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: “Smile and let everyone know that today, you’re a lot stronger than you were yesterday.”
quotes.author: Drake
